snippet: Thomas Vinterberg, director of Denmark’s foreign-language Oscar hopeful, “The Hunt,” speaks about his involvement with the Dogma 95 movement and how his new film grew out of an earlier success.
abstract: Thomas Vinterberg, director of Denmark’s foreign-language Oscar hopeful, “The Hunt,” speaks about his involvement with the Dogma 95 movement and how his new film grew out of an earlier success.

headline.main: From Denmark, a Hopeful Contends With His Own Legacy
